item.title: FLOSS Media Centers
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: Media centers could become the main interfaces to media content in home networks . The Telematics Freedom Foundation recently released a short report on Free Libre Open Source Software (FLOSS) options here. The report compares features of projects like XBMC, MythTV, freevo, Moovida (Elisa) and so on.
item.content:encoded: Media centers could become the main interfaces to media content in home networks . The Telematics Freedom Foundation recently released a short report on Free Libre Open Source Software (FLOSS) options here. The report compares features of projects like XBMC, MythTV, freevo, Moovida (Elisa) and so on.

item.title: iPlayer Reach
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: Some important numbers about the use of iPlayer can be seen here in this TIMESONLINE story: Before that, they appear on iPlayer, the free service which notched up 41m programme requests in December and 271m during the whole of 2008.
item.content:encoded:
Some important numbers about the use of iPlayer can be seen here in this TIMESONLINE story:

Before that, they appear on iPlayer, the free service which notched up 41m programme requests in December and 271m during the whole of 2008.
